solution_line_template: Chandler has sold {rolls_sold_grandmother} rolls + {rolls_sold_uncle} rolls + {rolls_sold_neighbor} rolls = <<{rolls_sold_grandmother}+{rolls_sold_uncle}+{rolls_sold_neighbor}={total_rolls_sold}>>{total_rolls_sold} rolls.
Chandler still needs to sell {rolls_needed_total} rolls – {total_rolls_sold} rolls = <<{rolls_needed_total}-{total_rolls_sold}={rolls_remaining_to_sell}>>{rolls_remaining_to_sell} rolls.
